item.title: CVE-2024-33690|2024-08-02T02:36:04.501Z -- jegstudio -- financio
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jegstudio Financio.This issue affects Financio: from n/a through 1.1.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-38785|2024-07-21T21:10:09.429Z -- jegstudio -- gutenverse
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jegstudio Gutenverse allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Gutenverse: from n/a through 1.9.2.
